# smpspltools

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/smpspltools)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=smpspltools)
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The `smpspltools` package provides various helper functions for *smpspl* and related packages.

## Installation

You can install the development version of smpspltools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("leonfernandes/smpspltools")
```
